title: Opera’s MiniPay Hits 1 Million Users Mark in Africa, Signaling a Shift in Financial Inclusion
description: Opera, the global web innovator, has reached a milestone with its MiniPay payments platform, garnering over 1 million users across Nigeria, Kenya, and Ghana. Launched in September 2022, MiniPay is a dollar-pegged stablecoin wallet smoothly integrated into Opera’s popular Mini browser. title: Warren vs. crypto investors – Battle royale over anti-crime bill
